author.name: Sam Turnbull • It Doesn't Taste Like Chicken

description: This soup takes just 20 minutes to make! Quick, easy, creamy, and totally dairy-free.
keywords: dairy free cream of mushroom soup, vegan cream of mushroom soup, vegan cream of mushroom soup recipe, vegan mushroom soup, vegan mushroom soup recipe
name: Vegan Cream of Mushroom Soup
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup all-purpose flour (or gluten-free flour if preferred)
1 1/2 cups full-fat coconut milk (the kind in a can)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large soup pot, melt the vegan butter over medium-high heat. Add the mushrooms, onion, and garlic and sauté until the mushrooms have softened and browned. Sprinkle over the flour, stir in, and cook 1 minute more.

Pour in the vegetable broth, coconut milk, thyme, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Use your spoon to scrape the bottom of the pan and remove any bits stuck to the bottom. Bring to a simmer and cook for about 5 minutes, to thicken slightly.

video.name: Vegan Cream of Mushroom Soup - just 20 minutes!
